subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Cilic, the United States Open champion, reached the final of the Kremlin Cup in Moscow, beating Mikhail Kukushkin, 4-6, 6-3, 6-2.
snippet: Cilic, the United States Open champion, reached the final of the Kremlin Cup in Moscow, beating Mikhail Kukushkin, 4-6, 6-3, 6-2.
